documents.document:
8 DAYS AND COUNTING

LOVE IS A TEMPORARY MADNESS IT ERUPTS LIKE A EARTHQUAKE AND THEN SUBSIDES AND WHEN IT SUBSIDES YOU HAVE TO MAKE A DECISION YOU HAVE TO WORK OUT WHETHER YOUR ROOTS HAVE BECOME SO ENTWINED TOGETHER THAT IT IS INCONCIEVABLE THAT YOU SHOULD EVER PART BECAUSE THAT IS WHAT LOVE IS. LOVE IS NOT BREATHLESSNESS, IT IS NOT EXCITEMENT, IT IS NOT THE PROMULGATION OF PROMISES OF ETERNAL PASSION, "THAT IS JUST BEING IN LOVE" WHICH ANY OF US CAN CONVINCE OURSELVES WE ARE.

LOVE

COULD U LOVE SOMEONE FOR THE PERSONAL INSTEAD OF THE MATERIAL WHY IS IT ALWAYS A PRICE ON LOVE, SEX OR JUST INTIMACY, WHY ASK FOR SOMETHING U NOT WILLING TO GIVE WE IS A BEAUTIFUL THING THERE IS NO (I) IN WE......

THOUGHTS

1. A TRUE FRIEND REACHES FOR YOUR HAND AND TOUCHES YOUR HEART (2) NEVER FROWN EVEN WHEN YOUR SAD BECAUSE YOU NEVER KNOW WHO IS FALLING IN LOVE WITH YOUR SMILE (3)DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME ON A MAN/WOMAN WHO ISN'T WILLING TO WASTE THEIR TIME ON YOU (4) MAYBE GOD WANTS U TO MEET A FEW WRONG PEOPLE BEFORE MEETING THE RIGHT ONE, SO THAT WHEN WE FINALLY MEET THAT PERSON WE WILL KNOW HOW TO BE GRATEFUL (5) DON'T CRY BECAUSE IT IS OVER SMILE BECAUSE IT HAPPENED (6) THERE'S ALWAYS GOING TO BE PEOPLE THAT HURT YOU SO WHAT YOU HAVE TO DO IS KEEP ON TRUSTING AND JUST BE MORE CAREFUL ABOUT WHO U TRUST NEXT TIME AROUND (7) MAKE YOURSELF A BETTER PERSON AND KNOW WHO YOU ARE BEFORE YOU TRY AND KNOW SOMEONE ELSE AND EXPECT THEM TO KNOW U (8) DON'T TRY SO HARD THE BEST THINGS COME WHEN YOU LEAST EXPECT THEM TOO (9) TO THE WORLD YOU MAY BE ONE PERSON BUT TO ONE PERSON YOU MAY BE THE WORLD.......

Birthday

FIRST LET ME THANK AND BLESS THE ALMIGHTY FOR LETTING ME WAKE UP ANOTHER BEAUTIFUL DAY AND CELEBRATE ANOTHER BEAUTIFUL YEAR AND TO PAN FOR THE HAPPY BIRTHDAY WISHES, AND TO ALL THAT FORGET AND THOSE THAT REMEMBERED I THANK YOU ALSO, I HAVE TRAVELED LONG THIS WEEKEND OUT OF TOWN AND AM SO TIRED SO I WILL SAY CHOW FOR NOW AND STAY POSITIVE ALWAYS IN THOUGHT, LINDA

CONDOLENCES

TO ALL WHO REMEMBER THE FOUR TOPS WE HAVE LOST A GREAT SINGER, ENTERTAINER AND JUST ALL AROUND PERSON MR. LEVI STUBBS THE LEAD BARITONE SINGER HAS PASSED AWAY TODAY AT THE AGE OF 72 PLAY THERE MUSIC REMEMBER AND SAY A PRAYER TO HIS FAMILY HIS WIFE OF 48 YRS AND HIS CHILDREN AND GRANCHILDREN WILL BE IN MY PRAYERS AND THOUGHTS TONITE, I HAVE UPLOADED SEVERAL OF THERE SONGS ENJOY AND LET PEACE BE STILL R.I.P LEVI STUBBS

SWEETEST DAY

HELLO AND GOOD EVENING I HOPE EVERYONE HAS A OR HAVE A GREAT SWEETEST DAY WITH YOUR SWEETHEART, SOME DOWN HERE IN THE SOUTH DON'T ACKNOWLEDGE IT OR DON'T KNOW OF IT BUT IT WAS THE HOLIDAY DESTINATED FOR THE MEN BECAUSE THE WOMEN ALWAYS HAD VALENTINES DAY SO I'M SENDING MY SWEETEST DAY HELLOS TO ALL THE MEN WHO HAVE OR DON'T HAVE SOME ONE TO TELL THEM TODAY AND I HOPE IT IS THE BEST EVER EVEN IF U ARE HANGING WITH THE GUYS.......MUAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHH

WHATS GOING ON !!!!!!!!

WHAT'S GOING ON PEOPLE MARVIN GAYE WAS AND STILL IS A BEAUTIFUL SINGER BUT WHAT I WANT TO KNOW IS WHY IS OUR PEOPLE KILLING EACH OTHER, FAMILY KILLING FAMILY, JENNIFER HUDSON LOST HER FAMILY TODAY BECAUSE OF A TRAGEDY AND I HOPE AND PRAY THAT EVERYONE WILL PRAY FOR HER STRENGTH BECAUSE SHE IS REALLY GOING TO NEED ALL THE HELP AND SUPPORT SHE CAN GET AND HOPEFULLY THE CAPTURE OF THE KILLER AND THE SAFE RETURN OF HER NEPHEW, I CHOSE THIS SONG BY MARVIN GAYE BECAUSE IT SPEAKS VOLUMES OF WHAT WE ARE DEALING WITH THE COUNTRY AND JUST EVERYDAY LIFE PLEASE GO TO YOUTUBE AND LOAD IT AND LISTEN U WILL GET THE MEANING AND PLEASE PLEASE GET OUT AND VOTE MAKE THE RIGHT DECISION THERE IS NO WRONG OBAMA OBAMA OBAMA http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DtUMa0FtuWY

HOLIDAYS

HELLO AND I HOPE EVERYONE HAD A GREAT THANKSGIVING AND IS EXPECTING A FABULOUS XMAS NO MATTER HOW BIG OR SMALL SORRY THAT I HAVE NOT BEEN HERE OR ANSWERED MY MAIL WORKING THROUGHOUT THE HOLIDAYS IS A YEARLY THING FOR ME , THE HOURS ARE LONGER AND MORE BUSY PRODUCTIVITY IS ENOURMOUS AND THE CRIMINALS ARE EVEN WORSE SO PLEASE FORGIVE MY ABSENCE THE HOLIDAYS HAVE JUST PASSED ME BY I WAS LOOKING FORWARD TO MY B-DAY AND THAT TIME FLEW PASS WHOA HOW THE YEARS HAS JETTED WELL AGAIN HAVE A WONDERFUL BEAUTIFUL XMAS AND A PROSPEROUS NEW YEAR BECAUSE I DON'T KNOW WHEN THE NEXT TIME I WILL HAVE THIS TIME TO ACKNOWLEDGE YOU ALLS PRESENCE PEACE AND CHICKEN GREASE, LINDA MERRY MERRY XMAS AND A HAPPY HAPPY NEWYEAR

HAPPY HAPPY NEWYEAR

HELLO AND GOOD DAY IT'S NEWYEARS EVE AND I HOPE EVERYONE HAVE A BEAUTIFUL AND SAFE NEWYEAR AND A PROSPEROUS 2009 BE GOOD TO YOURSELF, FOR YOURSELF AND THE REST WILL FOLLOW PEACEEEEEEEEEEE !!!!!!!

SICK AND TIRED OF BEING SICK AND TIRED

IT'S 2009 AND WE STILL HAVE LIARS, SCAMMERS B.S.'RS AND JUST ASSHOLES EXCUSE MY FRENCH BUT I'M SICK AND TIRED OF BEING SICK AND TIRED OF THESE SORRY WANT A BE'S IS IT HARD TO BE A FRIEND WITHOUT LYING, A LOVER, COMPANION OR JUST BEING YOURSELF WHY IS IT ALWAYS A CATCH CAN U HELP WITH THIS, I NEED THAT OR THE OLD LIE I USED UP MY CREDIT CARD CAN U HELP ME DIDN'T U KNOW ALL THIS BEFORE U MADE YOUR PLANS THAT U HAVE TO RETURN TO UR POINT OF DESTINATION I GUESS WE AS WOMEN AND SOME MEN ARE SUPPOSED TO FALL FOR THE OKE DOKE AND I DON'T MEAN POPCORN EITHER GET YOU LIVES TOGETHER BE REAL LIVE LIFE TO THE FULLEST AND JUST BE TRUTHFUL ALL THE LIES AND THE DRAMA IS JUST UNBEARABLE WE HAVE ENOUGH POLITICANS TO KEEP LIES GOING FOREVER WHY DO WE NEED OUR FRIENDS OR SIGNIFICANT OTHERS TO LIE TO US GROW UP PEOPLE MAN DON'T WORK DON'T EAT AND IF YE SHARE PROSPER THAN YE SHALL NOT FAIL, EVERY LIE THAT U TELL U MUST CONGER UP ANOTHER ONE TO COINCIDE WITH THE FIRST SO IT'S THE BEGINING OF 2009 AND THE STORIES ARE BACK OH WHAT THE WORLD HMMMMMMMM!!!!!!!!!!
